The Maximal ship burst throught the portal its frame shaking from the 
stress. "Hang on Team this is going to be rough..." Sabre turned in 
his seat as the ship seemed to begin to breack up. 

Rave turned and began to raise the shields. "Hey Boss i think we've 
got problems here, the ships not holding up, Were breacking up..." 
The ship seemed to lurch and Rave turned back to the shields. 

Rave fell from his seat. Sabre's tall black and red form Lifted him 
quickly. His large black Bat wings twitched as he turned to 
WingRazor. "How are we doing over there Wing?" He placed Rave down 
and walked over his taloned feet clicking on the floor.

WingRazor turned frowning. "Were breacking up, The rifts already tore 
the ship wide open. Her hawk like eyes looked the panels over. "As 
long as C deck holds we'll be fi...!"

The ship lurched as they began heading towards the atmosphere. The 
split began tearing further... 

"Blast the Elders!" We just lost C-Deck and the Stasis pods are free 
floating! WingRazor growled and they began to hit the atmosphere. 

"Strap in team... were going down" Sabre straped himself in as they 
watched the pods spread out... "We'll find you... I promise..."
"Blast the Elders!" We just lost C-Deck and the Stasis pods are free 
floating! WingRazor growled and they began to hit the atmosphere. 

"Strap in team... were going down" Sabre straped himself in as they 
watched the pods spread out... "We'll find you... I promise..." He 
turned as WingRazor folded her wings and straped herself in. Rave did 
like wise his blue black body almost lost in the darkness. 

The maximal ship began to burn as it began breacking apart the impact 
split the ship in half sending the back end sliding away... overhead 
two pods fell from orbit and landed as well. 

Sabre looked up. "Everyone alive?"

Wing looked up. "I think."

Rave opened one eye. "Naw man, i'm dead..."

Sabre chuckled looking up and seeing the power was still working... a 
maximal sign was flashing.... "Hope you guys see us first." He 
pressed the distress signal as he blacked out...
